title: No connection after Champ Select.
body: So, I log onto League after a few days of fixing my driver which wouldn't display full resolution on screen, and I try to jump into Solo Q. Get through champ select, and after, screen goes black for a split second then returned to main client, with the reconnect button available to press. Press the button, and the loading icon appears, then the reconnect button comes back. Nothing I do will allow me to actually get into game, and I'm currently waiting for league to "check for corruption". Wish me luck!

replies.body: It ended up working, but took almost 4 hours.

> [{quoted}](name=Hatr3d,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=twh7FWox,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-28T20:27:52.759+0000)
>
> It ended up working, but took almost 4 hours.

I'm glad it works now. Ping back here if it causes issues again.

If it does, post your PC specs too, if you can.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/RhW2Aftj-activated-shard-on-loot-by-accident 
can you please check this out <3 please
